guru: though they conspire fake us to make us retire with the burning desire we make it out of the crossfire thoughts are higher elevated and focused while the path is narrow for those like us primo beats provoke us to meditate like zen with the will and the strength of a million men while they introspect where nothing is met its been that way for a while so much has come and then went but im confident a few are due to redeem their respective kingdoms with an abundance of cream so if i were to scheme it would be on a realer dream like formin effective teams to filter the smokescreens you totin in jeans dont even know the true enemy a fan of big and of pac and plus they both were friends to me past trivial pursuits like east and west coast feuds come against me on the mic many and most will lose like most dudes i love this hip-hop and this rap stuff but i dont like the shows where the ignorant act up while somell be rippin it they be in the crowd wilin flippin on kids for the chains and medallions or the kid they dont like from a beef from way back and decide thats the night perfect time for payback its wack for the group plus the others who came to see a fat ass show instead theres bullets aflame
